title: Tony Downs Food Company, Inc. Recalls Chicken Products due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, March 28, 2018 Tony Downs Food Company, Inc., a Madelia, Minn. establishment, is recalling approximately 96,384 pounds of chicken products that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, specifically hard plastic, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The...
